Text.Page: (This barrel is too neat compared to the dusty barrels around. And someone seems to have moved it recently.)<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>Move the barrel</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

While you were following Mihog, you made an unexpected discovery. The demokrons were once Khirians!
When Rhodos learned of this fact, he was furious.
Archdevan sorcerer? She ran right past me, with Zolyn and the popori right behind her!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Okay, thanks."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
Zolyn went after her. If you hurry, you can catch up to her and kill that damned archdeva!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What about Rhodos?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
I'll talk to Rhodos...calm him down. You worry about the archdevan sorcerer!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Consider it done!"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
This overcautious buffoon suspected a trap and wouldn't let me get by! Now we've lost the archdevan sorcerer's trail.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Don't blame him too much."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>
